name: B.U.S.Y
description:
Made for the Desert Bus for Hope 2021 Game Jam!

 -------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Follow your bus through sandy deserts, rich green hills, and snowy taigas! 

-------------------------------------------------------------------- 

You and your little bus have decided to touch a random thing and now there are tumor spikes all over the place. Now we gotta fix this thing by going to the hospital to get help; although, to get to the hospital you must face grueling challenges and puzzles, making yourself think big.

ControlsActionsWGo upAGo leftSGo downDGo rightRRestart (Can be used to exit)

The game is made by the Still on Randos Games/Studio idk Lol

Main people who worked for this game:

Coder : Ahnaf30e

Artist : Stargazer

Musician : TheCatGameDev and Strook

Jack of all trades : TheNerdyAdam
